```{r}
# libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(skimr)

```

```{r}
#print summry stats of diamonds dtaset
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

```

```{r}
# chaos
ggpairs(diamonds, columns = 1:2)

```

```{r}
# scatterplot
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
# histogram
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, fill = cut)) + geom_histogram()
```
